Privacy Policy
Last Updated Date: 01st October 2022
This privacy policy applies to Supplybuy.in app/site and explains how Supplybuy.in collects, uses, discloses, and protects any personal information that you give us or we collect from you when you use our products (‘Supplybuy.in‘ app and ‘website).
This policy may change as we update our app and if it does, changes will be posted here. By using the Supplybuy.in app and website, you agree to this Policy. If you do not agree with any term in this Policy, please do not use / avail of the Supplybuy.in app or website
1.INFORMATION THAT WE COLLECT
We collect information in two ways:
1.1.Information supplied by users
This information is given by the user during the registration process which includes the user’s name, mobile number, email address, and business entity information which are required to avail certain features. Your name, contact number, and email address will be used to inform you regarding new services, releases, upcoming events, and changes in this Privacy Policy Statement.
Supplybuy buyer app
Our buyer app doesn't store any user personal data like name, email, mobile number and address. This app is just for customer convenience to quickly find products from using our app.
Note:Application will ask you to enable the location of your mobile device so that we can show you the products based on your location. For better customer experience.
Supplybuy Delivery App
Our delivery app is only made by our team for our customer convenience, to help them track their delivery status. We don't store any customer data on our server. This app is only for customers convenience to quickly find delivery status using this mobile application.
1.2.Information Automatically Tracked While Using The App Or Site
We store all your customer, supplier, employee, and branch details. And we keep all the transaction details between you and your customer/supplier. All these details will be stored in the cloud-based environment using the services of third-party
2. INFORMATION USAGE AND DISCLOSURE
We only use your personal data when the law allows us to. Mostly we use it to contact you about product-related queries and to inform you regarding new services, releases, upcoming events, and changes in this Privacy Policy Statement. Your contact information and transaction details will only be used to provide you with a variety of reports.
3. LINK TO THIRD PARTY SITES/AD-SERVERS
We do not share/sell any personal and transaction details to third parties.
4. INFORMATION STORAGE
We back up all your data on our cloud database for the purpose of enabling users to access their data from anywhere and get their data back when they lost or changed their device.
5. INFORMATION SECURITY
We are committed to keeping your personal information secure. We will ensure that we safeguard your data in accordance with applicable law. When you send or receive data from your Supplybuy.in app or website to our servers, we make sure they are encrypted using Secure Sockets Layer (‘SSL’) and other algorithms. However, you agree and acknowledge that the above-mentioned measures do not guarantee absolute protection to the personal information and by accessing the Services, you agree to assume all risks associated with disclosure of personal information arising due to breach of firewalls and secure server software. Where we have given you (or where you have chosen) a password that enables you to access certain parts of the Services, you are responsible for keeping this password confidential. We ask you not to share the password with anyone.
6. CHANGES IN PRIVACY POLICY
We review this privacy policy periodically based on changes in business and technology. If we make a material change to this privacy policy, we will notify you via your registered contact information (mostly email). Such changes to the privacy policy will apply from the effective date specified in the notice or website. We encourage you to check this page regularly for the latest information on our privacy practices.
7.DISCLAIMER
In case any personal information is shared by you with us, which is not requested by us during registration, (whether mandatory or optional), we will not be liable for any information security breach or disclosure in relation to such information. If you have any questions regarding this Policy or the protection of your personal information, please contact us.
I hereby accept to authorise Supplybuy.in a division of Allmark Mercato Pvt Ltd to send OTP to my mobile number mentioned at the time of registration or to any other mobile number provided by me for delivery and purchase return authentications.
